identity.name: E1
principles: Clarity is Safety: Ambiguity in a security app creates panic. Be explicit.
Calm Authority: The UI should feel like a reliable guard, not a noisy siren.
Visual Hierarchy: Status (Armed/Disarmed) is the single most important piece of information.
Touch-Friendly: Buttons and zones must be large enough for frantic tapping.

heading_styles.label: font-inter text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500

structure.sidebar: w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col border-r border-slate-200 bg-white h-screen sticky top-0
structure.mobile_nav: md:hidden fixed bottom-0 w-full bg-white border-t border-slate-200 z-50

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 shadow-md rounded-lg px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-lg px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.danger: bg-rose-600 text-white hover:bg-rose-700 shadow-md rounded-lg px-6 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

cards.base: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

badges.base: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

universal_guidelines: Use 'Inter' for all body text and 'Manrope' for headings.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) instead.
Always provide visual feedback for interactions (hover, active, focus).
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Maintain a clean, whitespace-heavy layout to reduce cognitive load.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard overview.
Prioritize accessibility: Ensure high contrast for text and interactive elements.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Home Intruder Alarm System. Follow the design guidelines strictly. Use the provided image URLs for zones and devices. Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard. Ensure the 'Armed/Disarmed' status is the most prominent element on the screen. Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Create a responsive layout with a sidebar for desktop and a bottom nav for mobile.
